模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.removable.hostile

类 Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.GameObject
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.MovableObject
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.model.removable.hostile.Enemy
直接已知子类:
Boss, Monster
public abstract class Enemy extends MovableObject
Enemy is an abstract class. An Enemy is a non-controllable main.GameObject that kills the main.Hero a life whenever it or its projectile comes in contact. Enemies are able to be bubbled and free themselves from these bubbles after a period of time. Enemies change direction at random intervals, when hitting a wall, and when hitting the main.Hero's shield. Enemies jump at random intervals as well. Fruit is generated when enemies are destroyed.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum, int width, int height)
      Initialize the enemy.
      参数:
      world - InteractableWorld type, the instance of InteractableWorld.
      colNum - int type, the horizontal position of enemy.
      rowNum - int type, the vertical position of enemy.
      width - int type, the width of enemy.
      height - int type, the height of enemy.

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(Hero hero) throws IOException
      If enemies collide with a hero in shielding state then reverse the direction. If enemies collide with a hero in normal state then make the hero lose a life. If enemies collide with a hero with one life, then make hero die.
      参数:
      hero - Hero type, the instance of Hero.
      抛出:
      IOException - If the target fxml file does not exist, then throw exception.

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(CeilingUnit ceilingUnit)
      If the bubbled enemies collide with ceiling, stop moving.
      参数:
      ceilingUnit - CeilingUnit type, the instance of ceilingUnit.

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(FloorUnit floorUnit)
      If the bubbled enemies collide with floor, stop moving.
      参数:
      floorUnit - FloorUnit type, the instance of FloorUnit.

    • collideWith

      public void collideWith​(WallUnit wallUnit)
      If the bubbled enemies collide with floor, stop moving.
      参数:
      wallUnit - WallUnit type, the instance of WallUnit.

    • setBubbled

      public void setBubbled​(boolean bubbled)
      Set state of Enemy bubbled.
      参数:
      bubbled - boolean type, true for bubbled , false for not bubbled.

    • collideWithFloor

      public void collideWithFloor()
